mappy.plotting.misc module¶

_determine_cmap_boundaries(m, bins, cmap, clip_legend=False)[source]¶

Function that creates the BoundaryNorm instance and an adjusted Colormap to segregate the data that will be plotted in bins. It is called from plot_maps and plot_shapes.

Parameters

  • m (array_like) – Data

  • bins (array_like) – Bins in which the data will be segragated

  • cmap (matplotlib.colors.Colormap instance) – Colormap used for plotting

  • clip_legend (bool, optional) – Remove the values from bins that fall outside the range found in m

Returns

Return type

cmap, norm, legend_patches, extend
